description: This file defines a FastAPI router with multiple endpoints for managing agents, teams, workflows, and their sessions, including streaming responses for real-time interactions. It includes functions for streaming agent and team responses, handling file uploads, and CRUD operations for sessions and memories within a playground API context.

classes.name: AgentGetResponse
classes.description: Response schema for agent details in the playground API.

classes.name: AgentRenameRequest
classes.description: Request schema for renaming an agent session.

classes.name: AgentSessionsResponse
classes.description: Response schema for listing agent sessions.

classes.name: TeamRenameRequest
classes.description: Request schema for renaming a team session.

classes.name: WorkflowRenameRequest
classes.description: Request schema for renaming a workflow session.

classes.name: WorkflowRunRequest
classes.description: Request schema for creating a workflow run.

methods.name: chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Generator function that streams responses from an agent, yielding JSON chunks for real-time chat.

methods.name: agent_continue_run_streamer
methods.description: Generator that streams responses from an agent's continue run operation.

methods.name: team_chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Generator that streams responses from a team run, yielding JSON chunks.

methods.name: get_sync_playground_router
methods.description: Main function that creates and returns a FastAPI APIRouter with all endpoints for the playground API, managing agents, teams, workflows, sessions, and memories.
